Package it.unicam.cs.pa.jbudget105053.javafx

Class JavaFXTransactionCreatorController

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unicam.cs.pa.jbudget105053.javafx.JavaFXTransactionCreatorController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JavaFXController, JavaFXEditor
    public class JavaFXTransactionCreatorController
extends java.lang.Object
implements JavaFXEditor, JavaFXController
    This class implements the interfaces JavaFXController and JavaFXEditor and has the responsibility to manage the window that lets the user create a Transaction.
    Author:
    Tommaso Catervi

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      java.lang.String MESSAGE_CANNOT_REMOVE_MOVEMENTS
      The string error message for trying to remove a Movement without having added any Movement to the Transaction.
      java.lang.String MESSAGE_EMPTY_MOVEMENTS_LIST
      The string error message for trying to create a Transaction without having added any Movement.
      java.lang.String MESSAGE_TAG_NOT_SELECTED
      The string error message for trying to add or remove a Tag without having selected any Tag.
      java.lang.String MESSAGE_WRONG_DATE
      The string error message for trying to create a Transaction without having selected a Date.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void abortAction()
      Reset newTransaction to null and closes the current window.
      void addMovementAction()
      Allows to add a new Movement only after having selected the date of the Transaction.
      void addTagAction()
      Allows to add a new Tag to newTransaction only after having selected the date of the Transaction.
      void deleteMovementAction()
      Allows to remove a Movement from the movements list of newTransaction as long as the list is not empty.
      void executeAction()
      Adds newTransaction to the controller.
      Transaction getNewTransaction()
      Getter methods for the newTransaction.
      void populateChoiceBoxAction()
      If the current value of the tagChoiceBox is null, it fills the tagChoiceBox with all the selectable values.
      void removeTagAction()
      Allows to remove a Tag from the tags list of newTransaction only after having selected the date of the Transaction.

    • Constructor Detail

        Constructs a JavaFXTransactionCreatorController with the given controller.

    • Method Detail

      • executeAction

        public void executeAction()
        Adds newTransaction to the controller. It is possible to add the Transaction only after having selected the date and added at least one movement. Then it closes the current window via the abortAction(). This method is linked to the createButton.
        Specified by:
        executeAction in interface JavaFXEditor

      • abortAction

        public void abortAction()
        Reset newTransaction to null and closes the current window. It is linked to the abortButton.
        Specified by:
        abortAction in interface JavaFXEditor

      • addMovementAction

        public void addMovementAction()
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Allows to add a new Movement only after having selected the date of the Transaction. If newTransaction is null, it gets initialized with initTransaction(). Then the movements table of the Transaction is refreshed and the value of the totalAmount of newTransaction displayed on the window is refreshed too.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if something goes wrong.

      • deleteMovementAction

        public void deleteMovementAction()
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Allows to remove a Movement from the movements list of newTransaction as long as the list is not empty. Then both the movements table and the value of the totalAmount of newTransaction displayed on the window are refreshed.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if something goes wrong.

      • addTagAction

        public void addTagAction()
        Allows to add a new Tag to newTransaction only after having selected the date of the Transaction. Then it refreshes the movements table of the newTransaction.

      • removeTagAction

        public void removeTagAction()
        Allows to remove a Tag from the tags list of newTransaction only after having selected the date of the Transaction. Then it refreshes the movements table of the newTransaction.

      • populateChoiceBoxAction

        public void populateChoiceBoxAction()
        If the current value of the tagChoiceBox is null, it fills the tagChoiceBox with all the selectable values.

      • getNewTransaction

        public Transaction getNewTransaction()
        Getter methods for the newTransaction.
        Returns:
        the newTransaction field.
